With over 100 years of history, the University of Porto is a leading
teaching and scientific research institution in Portugal and worldwide.


Considered the best Portuguese University and one of the best 100
European institutions according to the most important Higher
Education rankings, U.Porto combines quality teaching and excellent
research with the best academic experience.
